divs: sighting detailsi was with friends having a picnic @ the woodley park recreation area on 6\24\12 when at around 6 pm. i was lying on my back on my friend's picnic blanket looking at the clear sky and noticed a commercial airliner flying over head, but pretty high. i then noticed a white orb, very high overhead, bright or reflective, with a starlike quality about it- was stationary above the plane. the plane passes on and i watch as the orb moves along in a rather slow trajectory and then stops moving for nearly 5 mins. or more. it then proceeds to make a very wide arc, very high, pausing a few times, then heads back in the direction it came from.
